query_summary: The buggy code lacks the else branch after the diagonal-check, so when black < 3 and that condition is false it produces no output instead of printing "Yes."
oracle_summary: The buggy code lacks the else branch after the diagonal-check, so when black < 3 and that condition is false it produces no output instead of printing "Yes."

retrieved.summary: The buggy code is missing an `else` statement for the second `if` block, which causes it to incorrectly print "No" when the second condition is not met, instead of maintaining the proper logic flow.
The buggy code does not correctly check if the `turn` variable is also 0 when determining whether to print "Yes" at the end of the loop.
retrieved.diff:
--- 
+++ 
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
                 break
     i += 1
 else:
-    print("Yes" if idx == 0 else "No")
+    print("Yes" if idx == 0 and turn == 0 else "No")
     exit()
 print("No")

retrieved.summary: The buggy code fails to handle the special case where the input string is "BA", causing it to incorrectly evaluate as "Yes" instead of "No".
retrieved.diff:
